statements: SELECT * FROM public_opinion_survey_results;
SELECT survey_id, survey_question, survey_date FROM public_opinion_survey_results WHERE voter_response='Agree';
SELECT voter_id, survey_question FROM public_opinion_survey_results ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_question, COUNT(*) AS response_count FROM public_opinion_survey_results GROUP BY survey_question;
SELECT DISTINCT voter_id FROM public_opinion_survey_results WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM public_opinion_survey_results WHERE voter_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef' ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_question, voter_response FROM public_opinion_survey_results WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01' AND survey_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_surveys, survey_date FROM public_opinion_survey_results GROUP BY survey_date ORDER BY total_surveys DESC;
SELECT voter_id, COUNT(*) AS total_responses FROM public_opinion_survey_results GROUP BY voter_id HAVING total_responses > 3;
SELECT DISTINCT survey_question FROM public_opinion_survey_results WHERE survey_question LIKE '%environment%';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_response FROM SurveyResults ORDER BY survey_date DESC;
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_response FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT voter_id, age, gender FROM VoterPreferences WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT voter_id, political_party, preferred_candidate FROM VoterPreferences ORDER BY political_party ASC, preferred_candidate DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT survey_id, survey_date, survey_response FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM VoterPreferences WHERE political_party = 'Democratic' ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT age, gender FROM VoterPreferences WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM survey_results
SELECT voter_name, age FROM voters WHERE voter_id = 123
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_results WHERE id = 1
SELECT voter_name, location FROM voters ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE timestamp > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM survey_results WHERE voter_id = 123;
SELECT survey_question, survey_answer FROM survey_results WHERE id = 5;
SELECT voter_name, age, location FROM voters WHERE age > 25;
SELECT survey_id, COUNT(response) AS response_count FROM survey_responses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_results ORDER BY survey_question DESC, id ASC;
SELECT * FROM survey_results;
SELECT voter_id, question, answer FROM survey_results WHERE id = 1;
SELECT question_text, category FROM survey_questions WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT * FROM voters WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY voter_name DESC;
SELECT voter_id, question, answer FROM survey_results WHERE recorded_at > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY recorded_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_results ORDER BY recorded_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT voter_id, question, answer FROM survey_results ORDER BY voter_id DESC
SELECT voter_name, age, occupation FROM voters WHERE registration_status = TRUE
SELECT question_text, category FROM survey_questions WHERE category = 'Feedback'
SELECT s.answer, v.voter_name, q.category FROM survey_results s JOIN voters v ON s.voter_id = v.voter_id JOIN survey_questions q ON s.question = q.question_text
SELECT * FROM VoterDemographics;
SELECT age, gender, ethnicity FROM VoterDemographics ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT voter_id, age, location FROM VoterDemographics WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT * FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_type = 'Multiple Choice';
SELECT location_name, city, state FROM PollingLocations ORDER BY state, city;
SELECT * FROM VoterDemographics WHERE age > 18 AND gender = 'Female';
SELECT location_id, location_name, city, state FROM PollingLocations WHERE state = 'California';
SELECT question_id, question_text, question_type FROM SurveyQuestions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, voter_id, response, timestamp FROM SurveyResponses WHERE voter_id = 123 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT result_id, question_id, average_response, total_responses, survey_date FROM SurveyResults WHERE survey_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
